conversations.english: I have a complaint to make. The bill you sent me was incorrect. What's more, it isn't the first time
conversations.chinese: 我要投诉。你们寄给我的帐单错了。况且，这也不是第一次了。
conversations.reply_english: Well, I must apologize, madam. We have new computers here, you know.
conversations.reply_chinese: 啊，我向您道歉，夫人。我们这里刚用了新电脑。

title: 对不起我忘记昨天借你钱了

conversations.english: Do you have the five dollars I lent you yesterday?
conversations.chinese: 你带了我昨天借你的五块钱了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh I forgot! I'll run home real quickly and bring you the money.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，我忘了。我会很快跑回家去给你拿。

conversations.reply_english: What happened to you last night?You didn’t show up．
conversations.reply_chinese: 昨晚发生什么事儿了，你没有来。

conversations.english: Did you remember to bring back that software I lent to you?
conversations.chinese: 你有没有记得把我借给你的那个软件带回来？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I’m sorry. It completely slipped my mind.

title: 我对昨天发生的事很抱歉

conversations.english: Hey， Cindy, I’m so sorry about yesterday. I shouldn’t have yelled at you in front of everyone.
conversations.chinese: 嘿，辛迪。我对昨天发生的事很抱歉，我不该在大家面前对你大吼。

title: 对不起我占了你的座位Taken your place

conversations.english: Excuse me. I'm afraid you're in my seat. You've moved my books.
conversations.chinese: 对不起，你坐的是我的座位，你把我的书拿开了。

title: 那不完全是你的错That’s not all your fault

conversations.english: I must apologize for having delayed the work．
conversations.chinese: 我耽误了工作，我得为此道歉
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，不，那不完全是你的错。

title: 你应该再把这些数据核对一次

conversations.english: I think you should look over these figures again. There are some calculations that are a bit off.
conversations.chinese: 你想你应该再把这些数据核对一次。一些计算结果有出入。
conversations.reply_english: I apologize. This should not have to be this way.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我很抱歉。这个应该不是这样的。

title: 怪我太粗心打碎了杯子

conversations.english: Let me clear away the broken glass.
conversations.reply_english: No,I can manage it myself.Just sit down,please.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不用了,我一个人就行了.请坐吧.

title: 我把饮料打翻在地毯上了

conversations.english: I'm sorry for spilling my drink on your rug.
conversations.chinese: 对不起，我把饮料打翻在你的地毯上了。

title: 那家伙是名符其实的黑手党老大

conversations.english: You didn't tell me she was married!
conversations.chinese: 你没跟我说她已经结婚了！
conversations.reply_chinese: 我试着想跟你说。你当时太入神了。

title: 很抱歉让你久等了I kept you waiting

conversations.english: Hi, Cindy. I thought I’d missed you.
conversations.chinese: 嗨，辛迪。我以为我错过你了。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I am very sorry, Hans. Thank you for waiting for me. You must have been here a long time already.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，真对不起，汉斯。谢谢你等我。你一定在这里等了很久了。
